Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The value of one editor field or even the widget configuration can depend on the values of other editor fields. The dependencies are defined in the XSD defining the content. We show an example for dependent fields: We change a field's value depending on the value of another field.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: An example that show how dependent fields work.

Link.LinkText: Get more background information on dependent fields.
